## Problem 3

set up fixed design elements
```{r}
n = 30
sigma = 5
mu = 0
```


```{r}
sim_p = function(mu) {
  
  sim_data = tibble(x = rnorm(n, mu, sigma))
  
  sim_data %>% 
  t.test(mu = 0, conf.level = 0.95) %>% 
  broom::tidy() %>% 
  select(estimate, p.value)
}
```
